name: Axe Climber
summary: You can climb wooden surfaces using axes.
description:
When you are climbing a wooden surface and have a hatchet or battle axe in each hand, you have a climb Speed equal to half your normal Speed. You must still have both legs available to climb and canâ€™t use either of the axes in combat while climbing. This feat can also be used to climb a surface of ice if you have a light pick in each hand.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
